title: Repacked as avi files episodes 5 to 8 from disc 2
description:
This is (I hope) Survivors disc 2 episodes 5 to 8 of the following;

Survivors written and directed by Terry Nation, the original 1st series of the cult BBC television series from 1975.
This is DVD Disc 2 episodes 5 to 8 copied using Imtoo, I tried it with a Cyberlink Power DVD player and it worked perfectly, includes the bonus interviews photos etc. Please enjoy and seed.	Sorry no subtitles	

I have made the disc smaller , it&#039;s an avi file format,for all the episodes.

Thank you to noname_maddox  who worked out it&#039;s a burning issue.

No matter I am going to do disc 3 in the same avi format.

Thank you to noname_maddox it made me feel better.

kglblue
